name: DIVA-GIS Project File
summary: Learn about .DIV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: DIVA-GIS Project files can be created by selecting Project → New within the application. Objects can be added to the map by selecting Layer → Add.

NOTE: While DIV files include layers, the layer data is stored in separate files. These files are often saved with a .SHP extension in another directory. Since layers are saved separately from projects, when a project file is deleted, the layer data is still available.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
